data.meta_description: After officially unveiling the Galaxy S22 series at Galaxy Unpacked 2022, Samsung Electronics has announced that the devices will be available in a variety of
data.text:
After officially unveiling the Galaxy S22 series at Galaxy Unpacked 2022, Samsung Electronics has announced that the devices will be available in a variety of unique, online exclusive colors.

Beginning today in select markets,1 those who purchase the Galaxy S22, S22+ or S22 Ultra will be able to choose from an expanded selection of colors that includes exclusive options only available at Samsung.com.

The Galaxy S22 and S22+ feature four online exclusive colors,2 including Cream, Graphite, Sky Blue and Violet.

The Galaxy S22 Ultra is available in Graphite, Red and Sky Blue.

Click here to learn more about the newest additions to the Galaxy family.

1 Online-exclusive colors available in the following markets: the U.S., Canada, the U.K., Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Portugal, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, the Netherlands, Belgium, Austria, Switzerland, Poland, Russia, the United Arab Emirates, Australia, Thailand, Singapore, China and Korea.
